charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, IN RESPONSE TO A REPORT OF A DOMESTIC INCIDENT, FAILED TO VERIFY THE EXISTENCE OF A VALID ORDER OF PROTECTION.
WHILE ON-DUTY, FAILED TO TAKE POLICE ACTION IN RESPONSE TO A DOMESTIC INCIDENT.
MADE INACCURATE STATEMENT  ON DEPARTMENT REPORT.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, ENGAGED IN A PHYSICAL ALTERCATION WITH A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY PREVENTED AND INTERFERED WITH A CALL PLACED TO 911.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, HAVING BEEN INVOLVED IN AN OFF-DUTY INCIDENT, DID THEREAFTER FAIL AND NEGLECT TO REQUEST THE RESPONSE OF PATROL SUPERVISOR.
FAILED TO CONDUCT A THOROUGH SEARCH OF A PRISONER.
FAILED TO REMAIN WITH THE PRISONER AT ALL TIMES UNLESS RELIEVED BY THE ARREST PROCESSING OFFICER.
Involved in a physical altercation.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), VACATION DAYS (35 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, STRUCK AN INDIVIDUAL  KNOWN TO THIS DEPARTMENT WITH HIS VEHICLE RESULTING IN INJURIES AND PROCEEDED TO LEAVE THE SCENE OF THE ACCIDENT WITHOUT REPORTING.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, STRUCK AN INDIVIDUAL  KNOWN TO THIS DEPARTMENT WITH HIS VEHICLE RESULTING IN INJURIES AND PROCEEDED TO LEAVE THE SCENE OF THE ACCIDENT WITHOUT NOTIFYING A PATROL SUPERVISOR.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY AND AFTER BEING NOTIFIED TO RESPOND TO AN INCIDENT INVOLVING AN OFF-DUTY MEMBER OF SERVICE, FAILED TO RESPOND TO SAID INCIDENT.
FAILED AND NEGLECTED TO MAKE PROPER ACTIVITY LOG ENTRIES AS REQUIRED.
WHILE ON-DUTY MADE MISLEADING OR OTHERWISE INACCURATE STATEMENTS WHEN ASKED IF HE HAD RESPONDED TO A SPECIFIC ASSIGNMENT.
WHILE ON-DUTY MADE MISLEADING OR OTHERWISE INACCURATE STATEMENTS WHEN ASKED IF HE RESPONDED TO A SPECIFIC ASSIGNMENT.
